item.description: Here's a new one for us (for me anyway!)....Bald Hill - let's explore this 1700 acre area of conservation lands in Boxford (bordering Middleton and North Andover) - owned by the Commonwealth and Essex County Greenbelt. I haven't been before so we'll be exploring with a small map...recommending a 3.5 mile walk which is about 1 1/2 - 2 hours in length and involving woodlands, pond and a hill...some of which is described as "rugged"...should be fun and weather forecast is good - sunny and about cool but not freezing.. Bald Hill reservation is not far off I-95 - take exit 51 - head for Middleton (south) and take first right on Middleton Road. Follow this 1.5 miles to parking lot on the left where there is a sign and a map.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a bright red jacket...red subaru.

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Bald Hill Hike in Boxford
